question: Legs and feet are swollen.  Knees painful.  Osteo physician started treating for arthritis with anti-inflamatory.  Result, more severe swelling of lower extremities.  Anti-inflmatory use stopped.  Diuretic is not working to relieve the swelling.  Also, diabetic with high BP.  Could this be a medication issue?  Lotril for BP and glyburide/metformin for diabetes.
title: Edema of lower extremities and knee pain
